amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit the use of funds from being used to support hydraulic fracturing in the Baldwin Hills/Inglewood Oil Field.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in the Congresssional Record to prohibit the use of funds to implement, administer, or enfore, with respect to hydraulic fracturing operations in the Inglewood Oil Field.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bass amendment (A042) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A042) offered by Ms. Bass.
